subject: [Ip-health] Interesting article: HIV/AIDS Drugs for Sub-Saharan Africa
body:
According to this paper 54% of all the AIDS drugs currently used in
Sub-Saharan Africa are Indian generics.

http://www.plosone.org/article/fetchArticle.action;jsessionid=CE9BF898A6AEBDA9D28B7CF1682FA8EC?articleURI=info%3Adoi%2F10.1371%2Fjournal.pone.0000278
HIV/AIDS Drugs for Sub-Saharan Africa: How Do Brand and Generic Supply
Compare?
Colleen V. Chien
Fenwick & West LLP, Oakland, California, United States of America
Published: March 14, 2007

--
Judit Rius Sanjuan
